welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Saco, known for its beautiful beaches, historic charm, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at International Jetport Airport is where all domestic and international flights are serviced.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at International Jetport Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sanford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sanford Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
